title: Romance Guide
content:
water

All Astarion Approval Down Choices

Agree to help Wyll save the refugees in the Druid Grove. Question his attitude toward the controlled fishermen at the Nautiloid wreckage. Say that the druids overreacted when speaking to Marriko and Locke in the Druid Grove. Agree to help Zevlor. Smear dung on your face when Sentinel Olak asks you to. Let True Soul Gut (in the Goblin Camp) clear your mind. Take the poison from the druid apprentice. Agree to help find Marina/Morina (on the way to auntie
